A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Aimless and pointless. Rubbish from beginning to end. Worse than The Force Awakens and I cannot believe that that is possible. This new trilogy is a worthless steaming pile of nonsense. Forgettable characters\, forgettable locations\, forgettable nostalgia points\, forgettable score\, zero vision\, zero creativity. Rubbish just like Looper.
